Staff are working remotely, and will respond to email.  Please send any questions to your advisor or to hcollege@uic.edu.   COVID-19 Updates and Resources         Breadcrumbs   Honors College    Resources    Graduate Schools and Careers        Graduate Schools and Careers       CAREER RESOURCES AT UIC   The Honors College is part of the UIC campus-wide network for career services and resources.  We partner with the following offices to lead Honors College students to customized career advising and job-search sources:   Office of Career Services Student Services Building – Suite 3050 (312) 996-2300  Student Employment Office Student Services Building – Suite 2100 (312) 996-3130  Business Career Center Douglas Hall (DH) 110(312) 996-2700  uicbizcareers@uic.edu  Engineering Career Center Science and Engineering Offices (SEO) 818 & 820 (312) 996-2311, (312) 996-2388  engrjobs@uic.edu  Liberal Arts and Sciences (LAS) Internship Program University Hall (UH) 521 (312) 996-0425  School of Public Health Career Services School of Public Health (SPH-PI) 190B (312) 413-9126        ONLINE JOB AND CAREER SEARCH RESOURCES    UICcareers UICcareers.com lists job and internship opportunities with employers who partner with UIC.  Sign up and update your profile to search postings that match your qualifications.  All UIC students have access to UICcareers.com.  CollegeGrad Entry-level job search site  Career Rookie Part of Career Builder.  Search internships, part-time jobs, and entry-level jobs  Career Information Research a Company, Organization, or Industry  O*NET OnLine Search detailed occupational information  Occupational Outlook Handbook Find career information on duties, education and training, pay, and outlook for hundreds of occupations.  U.S. Department of Labor, Bureau of Labor Statistics.  Zip Recruiter General job-search engine for students        GRADUATE AND PROFESSIONAL SCHOOL RESOURCES    UIC Health Professions Advising, Workshops, and Online Information  Health Professional Fields Professional school application information, links to professional health association sites  LAS Pre-Law Advising Available to students in all colleges  Political Science Pre-Law Information and Advising  General Graduate School Information and Events  UIC Graduate College  GradSchools.com Graduate school advice, application information, searchable school directory           Resources           Advising    Tutoring    Graduate Schools and Careers    Fellows    Scholarships    Forms
